name: postgres-crud-students
description: PostgreSQL CRUD demo (students) with Node.js and pg

scripts.demo: node -e "import('./src/index.js').then(async m=>{console.log('Initial:');console.table(await m.getAllStudents());const r=await m.addStudent('Alice','Wonder','alice@example.com','2024-09-01');console.log('Inserted Alice id', r.student_id);console.log('After insert:');console.table(await m.getAllStudents());await m.updateStudentEmail(r.student_id,'alice.wonder@example.com');console.log('After update:');console.table(await m.getAllStudents());await m.deleteStudent(r.student_id);console.log('After delete:');console.table(await m.getAllStudents());process.exit(0);})"
